You.response: Science fantasy in young adult literature features worlds where both science and magic work, paranormal abilities mimic magic, or science and magic are intertwined. It combines elements of both science fiction and fantasy genres. The Young Wizards series by Diane Duane is a popular example of this genre; [1, 3].
